pkgmetadata.longdescription: ============datacube-ows============Open Web Services for the Open Datacube.* Free software: Apache Software License 2.0* Documentation: https://datacube-ows.readthedocs.io.Features--------* Leverages the power of the Open Data Cube, including support for COGs on S3.* Supports WMS and WMTS.* Experimental support for WCS (1.0, 2.0, 2.1).
